metadata.name: Maha Mrityunjaya
metadata.description:
This NFT Offers a Glimpse Into Hidden Realms, While Soothing Your Soul With the Dalai Lama's Rendition of the Maha Mrityunjaya Mantra- One of The Most Powerful Ancient Mantras Still in Use Today. Use With Care And Good Intention. Crafted With Care & Minted With Love. M3TA

Sanskrit: 

ॐ त्र्यम्बकं यजामहे
सुगन्धिं पुष्टिवर्धनम्।
उर्वारुकमिव बन्धनान्
मृत्योर्मुक्षीय मामृतात् ॥

Transliteration:

Oṃ Tryambakaṃ YaJāMahe
SuganDhiṃ PuṣṭiVardHanam।
UrVāruKamiva BandHanān
MṛtyorMukṣīya Māmṛtāt ॥

English Translation:

I Worship That Fragrant Shiva of Three Eyes, The One Who Nourishes All Living Entities.
May He Help us Sever Our Bondage With Samsara by Making us Realise That we Are Never Separated
From Our Immortal Nature. 

Commentary: 

Sentient Life Emerges Like Petals From The Center of a Lotus Blossum, Guided by The Three Fundamental Forces of Apa (Quanta, Matter & Life Itself). 

Like a Lotus Blossum Endlessly Generates New Petals, so Too, Does Life Through its Endless Permutations.
